docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 16 --The Danish resolution asking the United Nations to endorse equal political rights for women was adopted unanimously today by the social, humanitarian and cultural committee of the General Assembly. Forty-one delegates...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 16 --The Danish resolution asking the United Nations to endorse equal political rights for women was adopted unanimously today by the social, humanitarian and cultural committee of the General Assembly. Forty-one delegates rose to signify their affirmative vote. The resolution was then sent to the General Assembly.
docs.abstract: On UN com passage of resolution urging equal pol rights for women

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS. N.Y., Nov.16 --Despite continued opposition of the United States to effective action against the Franco regime, representatives of the Latin-American republics to the United Nations General Assembly will meet  here Monday morning in an...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS. N.Y., Nov.16 --Despite continued opposition of the United States to effective action against the Franco regime, representatives of the Latin-American republics to the United Nations General Assembly will meet here Monday morning in an effort to establish a common front in support of the Spanish Republic in exile.
docs.abstract: reprs of Latin-Amer repubs, except Argentina, plan meeting to establish common front in support of Spanish Repub Govt in exile

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 16 --The last leg of the long hunt for a permanent United Nations home will begin Monday with the departure of eighteen delegates for Philadelphia, the first of four cities on the nation-wide site itinerary that was planned...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 16 --The last leg of the long hunt for a permanent United Nations home will begin Monday with the departure of eighteen delegates for Philadelphia, the first of four cities on the nation-wide site itinerary that was planned here today at a special meeting.
